title.rendered: Why Leak Detection Should Be a Top Priority for Homeowners

content.rendered:
Leaks are often sneaky, starting small and going unnoticed until they cause significant damage. That’s why leak detection should be a top priority for homeowners. A minor leak can lead to mold growth, water damage, and skyrocketing utility bills. Regularly inspect areas like under sinks, around toilets, and near water heaters for any signs of moisture or discoloration. If you hear running water when all faucets are off, it could be a sign of a hidden leak. Early detection not only saves you money but also prevents potential health hazards and structural damage to your home. Stay proactive and protect your investment by addressing leaks as soon as they appear!
